description:
Chinatsu and Koharu have come to drop off schoolwork with Bunji, who stayed home with a cold.  However, Bunji went out to play when Mom wasn`t looking and the two girls are left to wait in the livingroom...; Saturday night, after putting the family to sleep, the usual group of moms gather at Mom`s house with leftovers in hand.  This is the "Snack Moms."; Things are very lively with the Snack Moms. Nagasaki has finally come late, and it becomes a huge party after Dad, Bunji, Fumi, and Grandma join in after they are woken by the noise; On the day of the class drawing event, Bunji and the others have no interest in drawing and are restless, being unable to focus. In all this, Daichi is completely focused on drawing a crane that sits on an empty plot of land.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Girl Power / Snack Moms / Snack Moms Continued / Artistic Autumn
女の子パワー / スナックかあさん / 続スナックかあさん / ゲージツの秋
